title: 6 Tech Gadgets Under $50
description: Ken is back with 6 more gadgets under $50: are they worth it? Amazon Fire 7 on Amazon:  Koss PortaPro headphones on Amazon:  Amazon Echo Dot on Amazon:  Corsair M65 mouse on Amazon:  Aukey RGB Mechanical keyboard on Amazon:  Microsoft Lumia 435 on Amazon:   No, Ken didn't get a secret Amazon sponsorship (that I know of) but using my Amazon affiliate links does help support the channel.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
